summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Webcrafters Studio AI Code Generation Platform. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend glass design implementation is excellent with all major features working correctly. Minor session management issue identified but doesn't impact core functionality.

performance_notes.note: AI generation takes 30-60 seconds which is expected for OpenAI API calls
performance_notes.impact: Normal operation - users see progress updates

integration_issues.issue: User sessions expire quickly requiring frequent re-login
integration_issues.impact: User experience - need to login multiple times during testing

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
User registration with test credentials (handles existing user gracefully)
User login with valid test credentials (test@example.com / TestPass123)
Get current user profile after authentication
Get projects list (shows existing projects correctly)
AI code generation with job polling (30-60 second completion)
Project view and file listing with 15 files
Project download as ZIP file (7435 bytes)
Project deletion working correctly
Invalid login returns 401 as expected
Unauthorized access returns 401 as expected
Landing page loads with glass design and hero section
Landing page shows 27 glass design elements
Landing page displays 6 feature cards and 4 step cards
Registration page form validation and submission
Registration redirects to dashboard after successful account creation
Login page form validation and submission
Login redirects to dashboard after successful authentication
Dashboard shows stats cards (Total Projects: 2, Total Files: 29, This Week: 2)
Dashboard displays quick actions (AI Generator, Templates, Analytics)
Dashboard shows project list with existing projects
Generator page shows all 6 project types (Full-Stack, Frontend, Backend, Mobile, CLI Tool, AI Decides)
Generator page displays Use Template button
Generator page shows tips sidebar with helpful suggestions
Generator page has prompt input textarea working correctly
Navigation between pages via navbar working
